valr
  • Home

  • Reference

Function reference version 0.1

Read data

read_bed
read_bed12
read_bedgraph
read_broadpeak
read_narrowpeak
Read BED and related files.
bound_intervals
read_genome
read genome files (i.e., UCSC "chromSize" files)
read_vcf
Read a VCF file.

Single set operations

bed_cluster
Cluster neighboring intervals.
bed_complement
Identify intervals in a genome not covered by a query.
bed_flank
Create flanking intervals from input intervals.
bed_merge
Merge overlapping intervals.
bed_shift
Adjust intervals by a fixed size.
bed_slop
Increase the size of input intervals.
bed_sort
Sort a tbl of intervals.

Multiple set operations

bed_closest
Identify closest intervals.
bed_intersect
Identify intersecting intervals.
bed_map
concat
first
last
values
values_unique
Map signals over intervals.
bed_subtract
Subtract intervals.
bed_window
Identify intersecting intervals within a specified distance

Randomizing intervals

bed_random
Generate randomly placed intervals on a genome.
bed_shuffle
shuffle input intervals

Interval statistics

bed_absdist
Compute the absolute distance between query intervals and reference intervals
bed_fisher
interval_union
Fisher's test on number of shared and unique intervals.
bed_jaccard
Calculate jaccard statistics on two sets of intervals.
bed_reldist
Compute the relative distance between query intervals and reference intervals

Utilities

bed_glyph
convienence function for generating example bed glyphs
bed_makewindows
split_interval
Divide intervals into new sub-intervals ("windows").
bed12_to_exons
Convert BED12 to individual exons in BED6.
